name: Transactions screen lists transactions grouped by period
scenarioId: ios/Transactions_Logs_(Privacy_Dashboard)_45/List_Transactions_124/listTransactions:Transactions screen lists transactions grouped by period
methodName: Transactions screen lists transactions grouped by period

testSteps.description: 1: Transactions screen lists transactions grouped by period ({Group=Today, Description=Transactions that occurred today})

children.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user is authenticated in the EUDI Wallet
Given the user is on the Transactions screen
Then the transactions are listed grouped by period as follows by Today and Transactions that occurred today
And the transactions are sorted in chronological order within each group

testSteps.description: 2: Transactions screen lists transactions grouped by period ({Group=This Week, Description=Transactions that occurred this week})

children.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user is authenticated in the EUDI Wallet
Given the user is on the Transactions screen
Then the transactions are listed grouped by period as follows by This Week and Transactions that occurred this week
And the transactions are sorted in chronological order within each group

testSteps.description: 3: Transactions screen lists transactions grouped by period ({Group=Month, Description=Transactions grouped by month (e.g., August 2024)})

children.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user is authenticated in the EUDI Wallet
Given the user is on the Transactions screen
Then the transactions are listed grouped by period as follows by Month and Transactions grouped by month (e.g., August 2024)
And the transactions are sorted in chronological order within each group

userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to access the EUDI Wallet screen having organized all my transactions
  So that I can view and search the attestation presentations and document signing operations I performed with my EUDI Wallet

title: Transactions screen lists transactions grouped by period

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the user is on the Transactions screen
Then the transactions are listed grouped by period as follows by <Group> and <Description>
And the transactions are sorted in chronological order within each group
